name: Contrast Castle
description:
You wake up in an old castle, unsure of how you got there. All you know is, that you want to get out. Together with the help of a mysterious artefact you will be able to solve all the castle's puzzles and escape it's grasp. 

Contrast castle is a top-down 2D puzzle game with 10 levels. To solve the puzzles, the player has to switch between two different worlds to piece together information and move objects to their rightful place. 

This project was created during the Global Game Jam 2022
